com.nalinstudios.iscan.scanlibrary

Class ScanFragment.ScanAsyncTask

  • java.lang.Object

    ScanFragment

    private class ScanFragment.ScanAsyncTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,android.graphics.Bitmap>
    A class to scan the image on the click of the button. This includes cropping and saving the image on the disk.
